channel.title: What's your ideal spouse.
channel.description:
[quote="SassyRobot"] I kinda want to see what everyone ideal spouse would be on this forum. [/quote] In response to this I believe a thread is due. Why because I am bored.
My ideal spouse would be a musically talented (must play an instrument not just sing), tan-skinned, dark-haired, freckled, bitchy woman.

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I’d have to reinstall the client from Steam, but even if I did I’d have no way to play it because my internet is by satellite, which makes any online game impossible to play.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
Thanks kenny. Are you still playing APB? If you haven’t picked it up since RTW died, G1 was doing character restorations, you may still be able to get your avatars back.

I looked up Jessica Cannon as you had mentioned, quite simmilar. Mine has a narrower face and more pronounced nose. She also has no muscles to be seen. You’ll notice her veins in her arms, and the tendons in her neck. You can also see her ribs slightly. I have a thing for those sorts of things.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

Here:

[/IMG]

Oh wow. That’s pretty good work there. She kinda looks like Jessica Cannon, only in street clothes and with more realistic proportions. Very nice work indeed.

I wish I had some frames of my character customization- I did one Enforcer character that was based on concept for a detective character in one of my game plotlines. But sadly, I never screencapped it.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
This is how I expect the conversation to go…

[indent]You: “Your criteria says you’re nitpicky”
Him (nitpickily): “Why surprised, I didn’t say I wasn’t”[/indent]

That being said, I agree. To prefer a hair color or complexion is for hipsters.
…of course I’m probably just saying this since I prefer brunettes and don’t want to be called unoriginal for not liking something rarer…

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: eyvn
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

think it’s kind of nitpicky to prefer certain races/complexions/hair colors

I prefer pie over cake, blue over green, jeans and a t-shirt over dressier clothes - why shouldn’t I prefer a certain hair colour over another?

Btw, if I can’t have the burly blonde, I’ll take the man your man can smell like.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
So your ideal spouse is a lady with a somewhat mediocre texture resolution, eh

I don’t see why one’s spouse HAS to be a gamer. Seems a bit nitpicky, but that’s just me, I’d rather not have every one of my characteristics mirrored in them, because then the relationship would be boring as hell.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

She needs to like video games. With at least some overlapping in favored genres.

Well yeah, I forgot to mention the similar interests thing kinda. Gaming with them is really awesome, but not strictly essential.

Also what you said, eyes. I actually prefer green or brown eyes over blue ones, even if they are bright.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Have any screens of that character? Just curious.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

I may as well also divulge too much information for the internet.

Short. Somewhere in the range of 4 foot 11 and 5 foot 2.
Natural red or black hair. Red preferred. Close to the color of Amy in the current series of Doctor Who.
Blue or green eyes. Neither preferred, but if blue, vibrant.
Naturally pale, with fairly consistent skin tone. (few freckles etc)
Narrow facial bone structure.
Funny. Must think at least a few of the dumb things I say are actually humorous.
At least somewhat intelligent.
She needs to like video games. With at least some overlapping in favored genres.

I think that covers the essentials. I know, when the time comes, I’ll be lucky to even hit the mental aspects. But we’re talking best case scenario, right?

Oh height, I forgot height. Mid-tall.

Actually, at the risk of forever alone’ing, when I got ahold of APB’s extrodinary customization, I took about three hours and made the absolute most beautiful(to me) avatar I could. I’m pleased to say she looks nothing like any of those cookie cutter supermodels/TV stars/75% of female college students. I can’t stand that “perfect” look. I appreciate uniqueness in looks, and a relaxed, generally good natured/humored personality.

Also, @that comic, I would take one loyal loving partner/companion to a roof over my head. Hence why I want someone easygoing who likes camping. Just on the off chance.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
JeffMOD:

Yeah, but all you need is love.

That said, I really don´t know about my ideal spouse, not to good at relationships :S

item.title: What's your ideal spouse.
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
Siggs:

-Middleish height [COLOR=‘Red’]check
-Not rediculously skinny [COLOR=‘red’]check
-Brunette, or redhead. [COLOR=‘red’]hair colour is unimportant
-Slight freckles [COLOR=‘red’]irrelevant detail
-distinctive eyes are a MUST. I have a thing for eyes. Glasses too. [COLOR=‘red’]eyes check, glasses optional
-Compatible sense of humour, but not identical. [COLOR=‘red’]check
-Not too outgoing, like myself; Needs to like their private time, either as a couple or singular. [COLOR=‘red’]check
-Unorthodox gestures to show their affection? I’d like to think everyone at least agrees with this one. [COLOR=‘red’]do blowjobs count as unorthodox affectionate gestures?

:retard:

Read full topic
